result.purpose: Provides an in-memory storage solution for arbitrary data with expiration capabilities.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating memory storage functionality and its associated tests, promoting separation of concerns and maintainability.

internal/memory/memory.go.purpose: Provides an in-memory storage solution for arbitrary data with expiration capabilities.
side_effects: Starts a background garbage collection loop
risks: Potential memory leaks if items are not properly expired
Concurrency issues if not handled correctly

internal/memory/memory_test.go.purpose: Unit tests and benchmarks for a memory store implementation.
side_effects: Modifies the state of the memory store during tests.
risks: Potential race conditions if not properly synchronized.
